summary: The BOP Direct-Hire Authority Act grants the Director of the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) direct-hire authority for qualified candidates to fill competitive service positions at BOP facilities. This authority is exempt from standard civil service provisions, except for sections 3303 and 3328. The authority is set to expire once 96% of the total competitive service positions at those facilities as of the date of the act's enactment are filled. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on May 13, 2025.
